titleStmt.title: A Full and true relation of a maid living in Newgate Street in London who was buried on Saturday the 27 of this instant December, and taken up (supposed to be alive) the 30 of the same, being buried near Christ-Church hospital in the church-yard of the same.

A Full and true relation of a maid living in Newgate Street in London who was buried on Saturday the 27 of this instant December, and taken up (supposed to be alive) the 30 of the same, being buried near Christ-Church hospital in the church-yard of the same.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
